item.description:
Maurizio's (http://www.mauriziosb...) specializes in a unique cuisine in Boston's North End. It is from the island of Sardinia, off the Italian coast, from which chef/owner Maurizio Loddo hails. He has made up a holiday menu just for NEEM members. The 4-course dinner includes calamari or eggplant to start, then a salad, 4 entrees to choose from- ravioli filled with prosciutto & figs, a Sardinian pasta dish with meat sauce, frutti di mare (shrimp, scallops, clams, mussels, calamari in a tomato sauce, tossed with linguine), and filet of soul Sardinian style. The dessert course will be tiramisu or connoli and coffee. The prix fixe price is $30. Tax, tip and other drinks are extra. Cash will be the easiest way for us to settle the bill.

The restaurant is located on the left-hand side of Hanover Street as you walk from the Greenway, just before the Paul Revere Mall. (statue of Paul Revere) Haymarket (Green & Orange lines)is the nearest T-station and the Parcel 7 Garage, 136 Blackstone St. (entrance on Sudbury) the best place to park. If you get there between 6:00 and 7:00, join us for wine, beer or soft drinks, as we celebrate the season. It should be a delicious meal.

Because of this busy season, RVSP's will be accepted immediately. But please note, if you're a 'Yes' (there are no 'Maybes') as of Friday, December 15th at 5:00 PM, the I will be obligated to pay for you whether you attend or not. Please try to join us.
item.name: Maurizio's-Holiday Dinner
